notice_one.message: The final exam schedule for the Fall 2023 semester is now available. Please see the attached document for more information.

notice_two.message: The library will be closed on Saturday, July 18th for a staff training session. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

notice_three.message: New student orientation will be held on Saturday, August 1st from 9am to 1pm in the Student Union Ballroom. This event is for all new students who will be attending the college this fall.

notice_four.message: The deadline to apply for financial aid is approaching. Please submit your application by August 15th.

notice_five.message: The Fall 2023 semester will begin on August 22nd. Please make sure to register for your classes by August 15th.

notice_six.message: The football team will be playing their first game of the season on August 27th. Tickets are on sale now.

notice_seven.message: The annual club fair will take place on September 5th in the Student Union. Don't miss out on this opportunity to join various student organizations.

notice_eight.message: A resume workshop will be held on September 10th at 2pm in the Career Services Center. Learn valuable tips and techniques to enhance your resume.

notice_nine.message: The room selection process for the upcoming academic year will begin on September 15th. Stay tuned for more information.

notice_ten.message: A flu shot clinic will be held on October 1st from 9am to 4pm in the Student Health Center. Protect yourself from the flu this season.
